entry.tran: 公正的；一视同仁的;不偏不倚的
entry.def: If someone is even-handed, they are completely fair, especially when they are judging other people or dealing with two groups of people.

example.ex: ...an even-handed approach to the war on drugs...
example.tran: 打击毒品斗争中一视同仁的做法

example.ex: The administration wants to ensure the meetings appear evenhanded.
example.tran: 政府希望确保这些会议公平公正。
